enDesc: A contemporary study of the book of Kings, focused on finding classical and new answers to the textual and moral issues found there.
enShortDesc: 21st-century English commentary on the Book of Kings by Rabbi Chaim Jachter.
heShortDesc: פירוש באנגלית על ספר מלכים שחיבר במאה ה-21 הרב חיים ג׳קטר.
